name: Hap%27s_Diner
text:
Hap's Diner
Hap's Diner was a diner in Deer Meadow, Washington, owned by Jack. Teresa Banks worked the night shift prior to her death, and was often late, according to co-worker Irene.
Behind the scenes
In the shooting script of Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me, it is called Hap's Truck Stop.
